answers.answer: I experienced the same thing only thing is my fingers gets all tingling and then a get a burning feeling in my left lower pelvic area. I get nerve pain as well and spoke to my doctors, they say it has to do with position of baby and its comes with the pregnancy. Also next appointment with your doc. You should ask him/her about the pain. That might give you a peace of mind.

question: Im 37 ftm and im having a lot of nerve pains. Both feet have spots where it feels like they are burning.  A spot on one shin. And a spot on one arm. Same burning feeling. I also got tendonitis now due to pregnancy.  Any one else?  I don't know anybody else who is having this issue.  Also have preeclampsia and gestational diabetes.  But other than that its been rather smooth.
title: nerve pains?
